text: "The Only Difference Between Martyrdom and Suicide Is Press Coverage", also shortened to "The Only Difference" for radio plays and ease, is a song written by Ryan Ross for Panic at the Disco's debut, A Fever You Can't Sweat Out. It was released as a radio only single. Category:2005 songs Category:Panic! at the Disco songs
title: The Only Difference Between Martyrdom and Suicide Is Press Coverage
